data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of La Paz, Bolivia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Paz, Bolivia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of La Paz, Bolivia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in La Paz, Bolivia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in La Paz, Bolivia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to La Paz, Bolivia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 503,466 believers in the state of La Paz into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in La Paz, Bolivia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
